      • disableRadioDoRecovery

        public static boolean disableRadioDoRecovery(boolean disabled)
        Disable radio Do Recovery fuction. For some private SIM cards, broken network issues may occur.
        Parameters:
        disabled - true:disable the fuction; false:enable the fuction
        Returns:
        true if success; false if failed

      • setAppNetworkRule

        public static boolean setAppNetworkRule(boolean enable,
                        java.util.List<java.lang.String> address)
        Call this method to set application networking rule.
        Parameters:
        enable - true: allow to connect, false: forbid to connect.
        address - list of addresses that need to be allowed or forbidden to connect.
        Returns:
        true if success; false if failed

      • getAppNetworkRule

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getAppNetworkRule()
        Call this method to get application networking rule.
        Returns:
        address list that application is not allow to connect.

      • clearAppNetworkRule

        public static boolean clearAppNetworkRule()
        Call this method to clear all previously set application networking rules.
        Returns:
        true if success; false if failed
